body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hotel Bliss customer support. My name is Jonathan Roberts and I will be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Sarah Rivera.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you Sarah. Could you please provide me with the room number where you are currently staying and the exact time the noise issue occurred?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I'm staying in room two one three and the noise issue started at eleven fifteen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm the number of individuals in the neighboring room causing the disturbance and describe the type of noise you are hearing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: There were three people in the neighboring room and the noise was loud music and shouting.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing me with all the details, Sarah. I will address this issue immediately and ensure your peace and quiet. If you need anything else, feel free to let me know.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Jonathan. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sarah. Thank you for reaching out and bringing this to our attention. Have a pleasant stay at Hotel Bliss! Goodbye.
